articles.description: Ireland, which has the second lowest COVID-19 infection rate in Western Europe, is set for a "serious increase" in cases following the relaxation of restrictions, its health minister said on Thursday, as officials called for new curbs.
articles.content: DUBLIN (Reuters) -Ireland, which has the second lowest COVID-19 infection rate in Western Europe, is set for a serious increase in cases following the relaxation of restrictions, its health minister … [+1764 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Pfizer applies for COVID-19 vaccine approval in Japan - Reuters India
articles.description: Drugmaker Pfizer Inc said on Friday it had applied for approval in Japan for its COVID-19 vaccine, which is already being administered in the United Kingdom and the United States.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
